Class MapPane

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.map.MapPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, LayerChangeListener
public class MapPane extends Object implements LayerChangeListener
This class can be used to generate map graphics when access to the graphics subsystem is not available.
Author:
Erik Engstrom, Douglas Lau
